prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon that sparkles and has crystalline features.
Imagine a Pokemon made entirely of snowflakes, ready for battle in the tundra.
Design a unique ice-type Pokemon with a spherical body and sharp icy edges.
Show me a Pokemon that can freeze its opponents with its chilling gaze and icy body.
Generate a Pokemon that combines beauty and danger, resembling a snowstorm in appearance.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter, with frosty colors and sharp shapes.
Give me an ice-type Pokemon that is both elegant and formidable, with a symmetrical design.
